name: MPSImageDescriptor
desc: A description of the attributes used to create an MPSImage.

items.name: init(channelFormat: MPSImageFeatureChannelFormat, width: Int, height: Int, featureChannels: Int)
items.desc: Creates an image descriptor for a single image.

items.name: init(channelFormat: MPSImageFeatureChannelFormat, width: Int, height: Int, featureChannels: Int, numberOfImages: Int, usage: MTLTextureUsage)
items.desc: Creates an image descriptor for an image container with options to set texture usage and batch size (number of images).

items.name: var featureChannels: Int
items.desc: The number of feature channels per pixel.

items.name: var numberOfImages: Int
items.desc: The number of images for batch processing.

items.name: var pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat
items.desc: The pixel format for the underlying texture.

items.name: var channelFormat: MPSImageFeatureChannelFormat
items.desc: The storage format to use for each channel in the image.

items.name: var cpuCacheMode: MTLCPUCacheMode
items.desc: The CPU cache mode of the underlying texture.

items.name: var storageMode: MTLStorageMode
items.desc: The storage mode of underlying texture.

items.name: var usage: MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: Options to specify the intended usage of the underlying texture.
